The Tiaohu No.3 Coal Mine is a coal mine located in the Hami region of Xinjiang, China

operators: 巴里坤县鑫源煤炭有限责任公司 (Baqin County Xinyuan Coal Co., Ltd.)
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Baqin County Xinyuan Coal Co., Ltd. and has ownership stakes from Changchun Jiaye Investment Company and Shi Zhonglin.
